logicalTable.name: Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot

logicalColumns.name: # of Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines
Expected Opportunity Line Revenue in Document Currency

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'QUOTA' AND %2 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%3, 'NONE') <> 'PARENTSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN %5 ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'QUOTA' AND %2 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%3, 'NONE') <> 'PARENTSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN %5 ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'QUOTA' AND %2 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%3, 'NONE') <> 'PARENTSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN %5 ELSE 0 END

CASE  WHEN %1 = 'QUOTA' AND %2 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%3, 'NONE') <> 'PARENTSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN %5 ELSE 0 END

logicalColumns.name: Revenue Line Conversion Rate

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE 100.0d * %2 / %1 END

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Total # of Days Open

logicalColumns.name: Total Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'WON' AND %2 = 'QUOTA' AND %3 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONE') <> 'DETAILCHILDSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%5, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %6, %7) ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'WON' AND %2 = 'QUOTA' AND %3 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONE') <> 'DETAILCHILDSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%5, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %6, %7) ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'WON' AND %2 = 'QUOTA' AND %3 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONE') <> 'DETAILCHILDSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%5, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %6, %7) ELSE 0 END

logicalColumns.name: Total Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'LOST' AND %2 = 'QUOTA' AND %3 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONE') <> 'DETAILCHILDSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%5, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %6, %7) ELSE 0 END

CASE  WHEN %1 = 'OPEN' AND %2 = 'QUOTA' AND %3 = 'N' AND  IFNULL(%4, 'NONE') <> 'DETAILCHILDSPLIT' AND  IFNULL(%5, 'NONRECUR') <> 'PARENTRECUR' THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %6,  CURRENT_DATE ) ELSE 0 END
